title: Carlyle's Currie Says Show Me the Oil Glut
description: The Carlyle Group's Jeff Currie says the oil and metals markets are “substantially underinvested” and have significant upside. “If you are having to scrape the data to find evidence of the glut, it is not an oil supply glut,” Currie said on "Bloomberg The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
